00023 DomainBase *Variable::clone
00024 (boost::call_traits<Variable::domain_ptr>::param_type dom) {
00025   if( !dom )
00026     return NULL;
00027   else
00028     return dom->copy();
00029 }

00035 Variable::Variable(Symbol const &name, DomainBase *dom)
00036   :m_name(name), m_domain(dom) {}

00038 Variable::Variable(Symbol const &name, DomainBase const &dom) 
00039   :m_name(name), m_domain(dom.copy()) {
00040   if( m_name.empty() )
00041     throw VariableException("Empty variable names are not allowed");
00042 }

00044 Variable::Variable(Variable const &other) 
00045   :m_name(other.m_name), m_domain(clone(other.m_domain)) {}

00047 Variable::Variable(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node)
00048   :m_name(parse_attr<Symbol>(node, "name")) {
00049   if( m_name.empty() )
00050     throw XmlError(node, "Variable name is empty.");
00051   rapidxml::xml_node<> *dom_tag = node.first_node();
00052   if( NULL==dom_tag ) {
00053     throw XmlError(node, "Missing variable domain on XML tag"); 
00054   } else {
00055     m_domain = s_dom_factory->produce(*dom_tag);
00056   }
00057 }

00059 Variable::~Variable() {}

00063 Variable &Variable::operator= (Variable const &other) {
00064   m_name = other.m_name;
00065   m_domain.reset(clone(other.m_domain));
00066   return *this;
00067 }
00068 
00069 Variable &Variable::restrict(DomainBase const &dom) {
00070   if( !m_domain )
00071     m_domain.reset(dom.copy());
00072   else 
00073     m_domain->restrictWith(dom);
00074   return *this;
00075 }
00076 
00077 Variable &Variable::restrict(Variable const &var) {
00078   if( var.m_name.empty() ) {
00079     if( var.m_domain )
00080       restrict(*(var.m_domain));
00081   } else if( m_name.empty() ) {
00082     if( var.m_domain )
00083       restrict(*(var.m_domain));
00084     m_name = var.m_name;
00085   } else {
00086     if( m_name!=var.m_name ) {
00087       throw VariableException("Cannot merge variables with different names.");
00088     }
00089     if( var.m_domain )
00090       restrict(*(var.m_domain));
00091   }
00092   return *this;
00093 }

00095 // Observers :
00096 
00097 DomainBase const &Variable::domain() const {
00098   if( !m_domain ) 
00099     throw VariableException("Variable's domain cannot be accessed.");
00100   return *m_domain;
00101 }

00103 std::ostream &Variable::print_to(std::ostream &out) const {
00104   if( isComplete() ) 
00105     return out<<m_name<<"="<<*m_domain;
00106   else
00107     return out<<"<?"<<m_name<<'>'; 
00108 }

00110 std::ostream &Variable::toXml(std::ostream &out, size_t tabs) const {
00111   std::ostream_iterator<char> pad(out);
00112   std::fill_n(pad, tabs, ' ');
00113   out<<"<Variable name=\""<<name()<<"\"";
00114   if( !m_domain ) 
00115     out<<"/>";
00116   else {
00117     out<<">\n";
00118     m_domain->toXml(out, tabs+1)<<'\n';
00119     std::fill_n(pad, tabs, ' ');
00120     out<<"</Variable>";
00121   } 
00122   return out;
00123 }
